entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve parser error recovery for statements used with expression bodied members #57614
  • Remove extraneous branch for empty strings in interpolated string handler CFG #57611
    Backlog
  • Run integration tests against unreleased builds of VS #57609
  • Support generating non-source files #57608
  • Add speedometer tests for Roslyn features #57607
  • Feedback for new global usings feature #57599
  • 'CS1591' should not suggest Design.cs file. #57595
  • How to fully verify the static tool library #57594

Closed

  • UseExpressionBodyCodeFixProvider crashes in top level statements #57570
    17.1
  • Background for editor config editors tabs are the wrong color on light theme #57255
    17.1
  • API for IFunctionPointerInvocationOperation #57195
    17.1
  • Major duplication of loc strings #52343
    17.0.P3
  • [SourceLink] Ensure source file found on disk matches compiled DLL #57351
    17.1
  • ChangeToNoGeneratedDocumentsUpdatesListCorrectly is flaky #56826
  • GetSymbolInfo for InvocationExpressionSyntax fails with OverloadResolutionFailure #57590
  • Code fix for CS1591 to inherit documentation #56620
    Backlog
  • Localize user-facing warning annotation #57296
    17.1
  • Smart line break doesn't respect indent_style #57323
    17.1.P2
  • Inconsistent order of evaluation between indexing with System.Index and System.Range #57349
    17.1
  • Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation #48082
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • AbstractFlowPass - VisitArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting `initializer`. #57612
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure we select a 'VB WithEvents' member in the navbar list when the user enters that member in the editor. #57606
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57605
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57604
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57603
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update VS editor package version #57601
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add truly synchronous indentation service interface for F# #57600
    Area-IDE
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Don't crash Use ExpressionBody on local functions in top level statements #57571
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Validate the checksum of source on disk #57541
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix flaky issue in the SourceGeneratorItemTests #57593
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust the order of evaluation for implicit Index/Range support to follow the recent LDM decision. #57535
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Clean up VsCodeWindowManager #57582
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Have navto only search generated-documents after doing the search of regular documents. #57538
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use DocumentOptionSet in AutomaticLineEnderCommandHandler #57579
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update the progress API shape to make it easier to mark a set of work as complete. #57547
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Track AbstractFlowPass.PendingBranches by label #57520
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Target executable projects and remote workspaces to net6.0 #57567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Minor refactoring in SettingsUpdateHelper #55123
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix spacing when generating editorconfig options from UI #54601
    Area-IDE, Community
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • [LSP]Re-enable information level logging in loghub now that VS supports de… #57588
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-enable BuildWithCommandLine test #57584
    Area-Infrastructure, Test
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
